docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column points to Turkey as cautionary tale of how successful country can be derailed by leader like Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan; notes similarities in personality and political strategy between Erdogan and Donald Trump.

docs.snippet: In his speech, former Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani of New York tapped into the emotions that helped get him elected in 1993, which are current themes in the Republican Party: fear, danger and anger....
docs.lead_paragraph: In his speech, former Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani of New York tapped into the emotions that helped get him elected in 1993, which are current themes in the Republican Party: fear, danger and anger.
docs.abstract: Former New York City Mayor Rudolph W Giuliani delivers speech at Republican National Convention emphasizing threats to United States and fear felt by many Americans; echoes themes that have lifted Donald Trump to Republican nomination.

headline.main: ‘We’re Coming to Get You!’ It’s Vintage Giuliani at G.O.P. Convention
headline.print_headline: Fear, Danger and Anger: It’s Vintage Giuliani at the G.O.P. Convention

docs.snippet: For many black Republicans, speeches have veered toward moralizing on race, an off-putting posture given Donald J. Trump’s unpopularity with minority voters....
docs.lead_paragraph: For many black Republicans, speeches have veered toward moralizing on race, an off-putting posture given Donald J. Trump’s unpopularity with minority voters.
docs.abstract: Black Republicans express alarm over moralizing and polarizing speeches on issue of race delivered at Republican National Convention, fearing such talk will further alienate minorities from party; speeches, among them talks emphasizing rule of law and denigrating Black Lives Matter movement, are delivered by black and white speakers to largely white audience; 2016 convention has fewer black delegates and speakers than any in two decades.

headline.main: Black Republicans See a White Convention, Heavy on Lectures
headline.print_headline: Convention Speeches Unsettle Blacks in G.O.P.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY, YAMICHE ALCINDOR and JEREMY W. PETERS

docs.snippet: Delegates at the Republican National Convention thunderously booed Ted Cruz for refusing to endorse Donald Trump Wednesday — clouding an evening intended to highlight vice presidential candidate Mike Pence as a unifying force for the party. ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Delegates at the Republican National Convention thunderously booed Ted Cruz for refusing to endorse Donald Trump Wednesday — clouding an evening intended to highlight vice presidential candidate Mike Pence as a unifying force for the party. The disorder provided fresh reminders of the fissures that remain.

headline.main: Delegates Boo Cruz, Pence Tries to Unite at Convention
headline.print_headline: Delegates Boo Cruz, Pence Tries to Unite at Convention

docs.snippet: The United States depicted at the Republican National Convention is a scary place. It is wrenched by economic uncertainty, social upheaval, political dysfunction, runaway immigration, violent streets and existential threats from abroad. Republican...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States depicted at the Republican National Convention is a scary place. It is wrenched by economic uncertainty, social upheaval, political dysfunction, runaway immigration, violent streets and existential threats from abroad. Republicans want voters to see the need for drastic change. The nation's only choice, they say, is Donald Trump.

headline.main: AP EXPLAINS: Why Do Republicans Say Sky Is Falling? Is It?
headline.print_headline: AP EXPLAINS: Why Do Republicans Say Sky Is Falling? Is It?
